mapper.select: select house_id as houseId, house_name as houseName, house_price as housePrice, house_desc as houseDesc from imsi_housereg order by house_id
select house_id as houseId, house_name as houseName, house_price as housePrice, house_desc as houseDesc from imsi_housereg where house_id=#{houseId}
mapper.insert: insert into imsi_housereg values( (select nvl(max(house_id), 0)+1 from imsi_housereg),#{houseName},#{housePrice},#{houseDesc})
